1369610.name: Wacky Cartoon Racers
1369610.description:
Play with a variety of fun cartoon characters in a racing event for the Grand Prize of all Cartoon Land.

Run, jump, avoid traps and use items as you race to the finish!

ğŸ‡Choose from a zany collection of charactersğŸ‡


â— Miss Bunni - A fun-loving bunny
â— Avril - A skater girl, who loves to skateboard
â— Sir Rocky - A knightly squirrel who will defend his title
â— Aapo - A Mayan warrior who wants to win the race to buy more food
â— Skelly - The ruler of Cartoon Land
â— Plus many more!

ğŸ’£Wacky Weapons!ğŸ’£


â— Banana Peel - Make your enemies slip on this! hehe!
â— Fireball - Show 'em whos boss with this fiery weapon
â— Bouncy Boots - Lets you jump super high
â— Shield - Protects you from damage
â— Magic Hand - Bend space and time temporarily with this cosmic glove
â— Plus many more zany weapons to choose from!
